name: nfbii
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Equality theorem for the non-freeness predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.) ~ df-nf changed. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 12-Sep-2021.)
